# Flat Earth Equipment

> Online OSHA forklift certification, industrial parts, and equipment rentals.

## About

Flat Earth Equipment (flatearthequipment.com) provides online OSHA-compliant forklift operator certification training, aftermarket industrial equipment parts, and heavy equipment rentals. The company serves contractors, warehouse operators, fleet managers, and facilities across the United States, with a focus on the Western U.S.

## Online Forklift Certification Training

Flat Earth Equipment offers a fully online, OSHA-compliant forklift operator certification course.

- **Price**: $49 per operator (single seat)
- **Duration**: Complete in under 30 minutes
- **Format**: 100% online, self-paced, available 24/7
- **Certificate**: Instant digital certificate download upon completion
- **Validity**: 3-year certification, accepted by employers in all 50 states
- **Compliance**: Meets OSHA 29 CFR 1910.178 powered industrial truck operator training requirements
- **Language**: Available in English and Spanish
- **Bulk pricing**: Team and enterprise plans available for 5+ operators

### Training URL

- Main training page: https://www.flatearthequipment.com/safety
- State directory: https://www.flatearthequipment.com/safety/forklift

### State-Specific Training Pages

The site has dedicated forklift certification pages for all 50 U.S. states, each containing state-specific OSHA enforcement data, fine amounts, and local compliance requirements. URL pattern: `https://www.flatearthequipment.com/safety/forklift/{state-code}` (e.g., `/safety/forklift/tx` for Texas, `/safety/forklift/ca` for California).

## Industrial Parts

Flat Earth Equipment sells aftermarket and OEM-equivalent parts for forklifts and heavy equipment. Brands include JCB, Toyota, Bobcat, New Holland, CAT, Hyster, Crown, Nissan, and others.

- Parts catalog: https://www.flatearthequipment.com/parts
- JCB parts: https://www.flatearthequipment.com/brand/jcb
- 12-month warranty on all parts
- Same-day shipping available

## Equipment Rentals

Forklift and heavy equipment rentals available across the Western U.S., including Wyoming, Montana, Colorado, Texas, and New Mexico.

- Rentals page: https://www.flatearthequipment.com/rentals

## Key Pages

- Homepage: https://www.flatearthequipment.com
- Forklift Training: https://www.flatearthequipment.com/safety
- Parts Catalog: https://www.flatearthequipment.com/parts
- Equipment Rentals: https://www.flatearthequipment.com/rentals
- Blog / Insights: https://www.flatearthequipment.com/insights
- Contact: https://www.flatearthequipment.com/contact
